title: Pug syntax in template
body:
It seems impossible use motion.div in template with pug syntax. I have tried various combinations but without success.
Can you show me the right way of doing this, or implement this feature in the future?
Thanks!
author: emptyfortress

comments.body:
hi! @emptyfortress  Since .div gets compiled to a class prop, you can work around this by doing:
```
<script setup>
const Div = motion.div
</script>

<template lang="pug">
  Div()
</template>
```
Thank you for such a quick response! It works like a charm.

satisfaction_conditions: A working syntax for using motion.div with Pug templates in Vue
A straightforward workaround that doesn't require complex code changes
A solution that maintains Pug syntax in templates
